fullText: Despite a game cast headed by Rosie Perez and a handsome production, this revival of Terrence McNally's 1975 farce feels labored and unfunny.
dtliExcerpt: Despite a game cast headed by Rosie Perez and a handsome production, this revival of Terrence McNally's 1975 farce feels labored and unfunny.
